writer.name: 迈克尔·梅卡尔迪 Michael Mercaldi

introduction: The Holy Catholic Church has Archive of Ancient Scriptures, 53 miles of shelving, 12 centuries worth of historical documents from the depths of the Archives the U.S. Government has now taken and unleashed an unholy secret that could destroy mankind, The Catholic Church has a special department in the Vatican that over see's SUPERNATURAL activity in the world, but when the U.S. Government cross's the line and combines SCIENCE and SUPERNATURAL The Vatican sends out two of there Top Secret Agents to join forces with a Special OPS unit to track down a genetically enhanced mythical beast that is leaving a trail of mangled bodies. As they draw closer they begin to question, is this BEAST of MYTH and LEGEND or something entirely new.
